Reference

Environment Utilities

Utilities for working with R environments

place_in_env()

Place variables into an environment

Formatting Utilities

fmt_int()

Convert integers into strings

get_incremental_names()

Construct sequence of incremental names

get_max_int_len()

Compute maximum length of formatted integers

lgl_str()

Convert logical variable to string

pad_c()

Pad and join multiple strings within character vectors

pl()

Pluralize word

stringify_vec()

Stringify vector

titleize_first()

Make first word title case

JSON Utilities

Utilities for working with JSON

compact_json_str()

Compact stringified JSON

Lookup Utilities

Utilities for working with key-description pairs

mk_lookup_utils()

Create lookup utility functions

Mathematical Utilities

is_int_val()

Test if a number is integer value

is_invertible()

Check if a matrix is invertible

is_sym_pos_def()

Check if a matrix is symmetric positive-definite

Miscellaneous Utilities

`%||%`

Logical OR operator

`%notin%`

Find non-matching values

match_col_class()

Get column indexes of a given class in a data frame

mk_mtx()

Create matrix from vectors

simplify_lst_lst()

Simplify list of lists

Reference Class Utilities

Utilities for working with Reference Class objects

get_rc_fld_vals()

Get field values in an RC object (with optional replacement)

RNG Utilities

Utilities relating to the Random Number Generator seed

get_random_seed_val()

Generate random seed value

set_init_seed()

Set RNG seed

Statistical Utilities

get_stat_mode()

Compute statistical mode of sample data
